data.trans_hint: Họ được dạy dỗ rằng phải tôn trọng chính quyền.
data.en_hint: They were brought up to respect authority.
data.content_game_1: They were brought up to respect authority.
data.answer_en_hint: They were brought up to respect authority.

data.trans: Có tính gắn kết, dính liền
data.trans_hint: Chúng ta phải làm những gì có thể để tạo nên một xã hội gắn kết, ổn định và quan tâm đến các thành viên trong đó.
data.en_hint: We must do what we can to forge a society that is cohesive, stable, and caring of its members.
data.content_game_1: We must do what we can to forge a society that is cohesive, stable, and caring of its members.
data.answer_en_hint: We must do what we can to forge a society that is cohesive, stable, and caring of its members.

data.trans_hint: Chúng ta cũng nên xem xét khía cạnh xã hội của thất nghiệp.
data.en_hint: We should also consider the social dimension of unemployment.
data.content_game_1: We should also consider the social dimension of unemployment.
data.answer_en_hint: We should also consider the social dimension of unemployment.

data.trans: Trội, có ưu thế hơn, thống trị
data.trans_hint: Thất nghiệp sẽ là một vấn đề nổi trội ở cuộc bầu cử tiếp theo.
data.en_hint: Unemployment will be a dominant issue at the next election.
data.content_game_1: Unemployment will be a dominant issue at the next election.
data.answer_en_hint: Unemployment will be a dominant issue at the next election.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta đe dọa sẽ phơi bày sự phân biệt chủng tộc tồn tại trong lực lượng cảnh sát.
data.en_hint: He threatened to expose the racism that existed within the police force.
data.content_game_1: He threatened to expose the racism that existed within the police force.
data.answer_en_hint: He threatened to expose the racism that existed within the police force.

data.trans_hint: Để giữ cho cải cách kinh tế đi đúng hướng, 60.000 việc làm trong khu vực công phải được cắt giảm.
data.en_hint: To keep economic reform on track, 60,000 public-sector jobs must be cut.
data.content_game_1: To keep economic reform on track, 60,000 public-sector jobs must be cut.
data.answer_en_hint: To keep economic reform on track, 60,000 public-sector jobs must be cut.

data.trans: Sự khan hiếm, sự khó tìm
data.trans_hint: Sự khan hiếm nước này là không thể tránh khỏi ở các nước kém phát triển.
data.en_hint: This water scarcity is inevitable in less developed countries.
data.content_game_1: This water scarcity is inevitable in less developed countries.
data.answer_en_hint: This water scarcity is inevitable in less developed countries.

data.trans_hint: Ma túy đã trở thành một vấn đề nghiêm trọng trong xã hội hiện đại của chúng ta.
data.en_hint: Drugs have become a serious problem in our modern society.
data.content_game_1: Drugs have become a serious problem in our modern society.
data.answer_en_hint: Drugs have become a serious problem in our modern society.

data.trans_hint: Các nhà phê bình của chương trình này đã nói rằng nó sẽ không giải quyết được vấn đề tội phạm vị thành niên.
data.en_hint: Critics of the scheme have said that it will not solve the problem of teenage crime.
data.content_game_1: Critics of the scheme have said that it will not solve the problem of teenage crime.
data.answer_en_hint: Critics of the scheme have said that it will not solve the problem of teenage crime.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi đã khảo sát 500 người hút thuốc và thấy rằng hơn ba phần tư muốn bỏ thuốc.
data.en_hint: We surveyed 500 smokers and found that over three quarters would like to give up.
data.content_game_1: We surveyed 500 smokers and found that over three quarters would like to give up.
data.answer_en_hint: We surveyed 500 smokers and found that over three quarters would like to give up.

data.trans: Dụ, xúi giục, cám dỗ, lôi cuốn
data.trans_hint: Giảm thu nhập sẽ tiếp tục làm nghèo thêm các gia đình này và có thể cám dỗ tội phạm tiếp tục phạm tội.
data.en_hint: Reducing the income will further impoverish these families and could tempt an offender into further crime.
data.content_game_1: Reducing the income will further impoverish these families and could tempt an offender into further crime.
data.answer_en_hint: Reducing the income will further impoverish these families and could tempt an offender into further crime.

data.trans_hint: Suy dinh dưỡng trong vùng đang lan rộng - ảnh hưởng tới 78% số trẻ em dưới 5 tuổi.
data.en_hint: Malnutrition in the region is widespread - affecting up to 78 percent of children under five years old.
data.content_game_1: Malnutrition in the region is widespread - affecting up to 78 percent of children under five years old.
data.answer_en_hint: Malnutrition in the region is widespread - affecting up to 78 percent of children under five years old.
